name: BEDFORD DOWNS MANAGEMENT CORP., Respondent, v. STATE HARNESS RACING COMMISSION, Petitioner, Valley View Downs, L.P., Intervenor
name_abbreviation: Bedford Downs Management Corp. v. State Harness Racing Commission

judges: Justice SAYLOR did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: BEDFORD DOWNS MANAGEMENT CORP., Respondent, v. STATE HARNESS RACING COMMISSION, Petitioner, Valley View Downs, L.P., Intervenor.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of January 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. We also grant the Joint Application of All Parties and Intervenors for Consolidation of Petitions for Allowance of Appeal to consolidate this appeal with 540 MAL 2006 and 541 MAL 2006. Additionally, we grant the Joint Application of All Parties and Intervenors to Expedite Consideration of Petitions for Allowance of Appeal.
Justice SAYLOR did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
916 A.2d 528
BEDFORD DOWNS MANAGEMENT CORP., Respondent, v. STATE HARNESS RACING COMMISSION, Petitioner, Valley View Downs, L.P., Intervenor.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 19, 2007.
